item.title: Photography
item.description: I have started an instagram where I post new photos here. My Current Equipment Link to heading Canon EOS R10 - I saved up Â£1000 of my own money to buy this in late 2022. RF-S 18-45mm F4.5-6.3 IS STM Kit DJI Air 2S - A photography drone that I use to take pictures I would never have been able to get before. Pixel 6 Pro - My camera for on-the-go.

item.title: About Me
item.description: ðŸ‘‹ I’m Xander Link to heading I create Minecraft mods using Java and Kotlin, I love doing what I’m doing. My mods are on GitHub, Curseforge and Modrinth. I occasionally do commission work for Minecraft mods if I see a request that particularly interests me or I feel like it will help further my learning and experiences. I have also tinkered with some statistical analysis and AI with Python.

Contact Me Link to heading There are many reasons you may want to contact me, but some questions/enquiries may be better answered on my public discord server. You can create user support threads or just ask in #general. For most things, this will be what you want. Business Enquiries Link to heading If you’d like to do business with me you can either contact me through Discord private messages (@isxander) (where I will reply the fastest) or contact me through my business email.
